channel.title: ASF Jira
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [LOG4J2-178] Build broken: FlumePersistentAppenderTest fails because of java.security.InvalidKeyExceptions
item.description:

item.summary: Build broken: FlumePersistentAppenderTest fails because of java.security.InvalidKeyExceptions

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are not closed can be reopened.

comments.comment: This error is most likely due to the JDK not having the proper encryption support installed. I will probably have to disable encryption in the tests to keep this from happening. See http://stackoverflow.com/questions/6481627/java-security-illegal-key-size-or-default-parameters
Test for encryption is now disabled by default.
